input.sentences: there was a fire in the mini grill to get things rolling
and a attractive man holding a beer to attract the people to his home
and various meat to keep them coming to his house
when the man bent over to hand the women a sandwich she almost fainted
but she recovered her cool as there were many other people in attendance
output.sentences: At the BBQ They were using a Rolling Mini Grill.
Many of the new people in the neighborhood were at home holding on to beer.
The women decided to prepare sandwiches and had meat in hand.
The recovered people felt nice and cool.
The rehab program BBQ was a success.
